text: ==Teams and drivers== All cars used Chevrolet Vectra Stock Car chassis. All drivers were Brazilian-registered. The 2002 Stock Car Brasil was the 26th Stock Car Brasil season. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team ! ! Driver !
